Enterprise Systems

Enterprise Systems Design and Development is a package intended to help management of Small Medium Enterprises (SMEs) and established companies to smoothen up their operations. This package is made modular to make the development process more economical for our clients. Modules include -

Project Management System
Office Cloud
Backup Systems
Sales Management system
API Cloud
Stock Management system
HR Management
Billing System

Progressive Web Apps

Progressive Web based Application development is intended for customers or companies who are getting a application developed to increase user interactions and engagement. This system comes with multi-level admin hierarchy and single application for the users. Modules needed -

Web Design
Mobile App Design
Android Development
iOS Development
Back-End
Front-End
e-Commerce
Print Design

Native Mobile Apps
